author: Maxwell Coffey, Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
name: SpriteSheet
shortDescription: Animate a tiled sprite from a sprite sheet

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Animates a sprite sheet using JSON (see extension description).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: JSONSpriteSheetAnimator

eventsFunctions.description: Loads the JSON data into the behavior
eventsFunctions.name: _LoadJSON

eventsFunctions.description: Update the object attached to the behavior using the latest properties values.
eventsFunctions.name: _UpdateObject

eventsFunctions.description: Updates the animation frame.
eventsFunctions.name: _UpdateAnimationFrame
eventsFunctions.sentence: Update the current animation frame of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Loads a new JSON spritesheet data into the behavior.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load data from a JSON resource
eventsFunctions.name: LoadFromJSON
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load JSON spritesheet data for _PARAM0_ from _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Display one frame without animating the object.
eventsFunctions.name: DisplayFrame

eventsFunctions.description: Play an animation from the sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: PlayAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: The name of the current animation. __null if no animation is playing.
eventsFunctions.name: CurrentAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: The name of the currently displayed frame.
eventsFunctions.name: CurrentFrame

eventsFunctions.description: Pause the animation of a sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: PauseAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: Resume a paused animation of a sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: ResumeAnimation

propertyDescriptors.label: JSON formatted text describing the sprite sheet
propertyDescriptors.name: JSON

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Animates a vertical (top to bottom) sprite sheet.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: VerticalSpriteSheetAnimator

eventsFunctions.description: Set the animation frame.
eventsFunctions.name: _SetFrame
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the current frame of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Play an animation from the sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: PlayAnimation
eventsFunctions.sentence: Play animation of _PARAM0_ on column _PARAM5_ from frames _PARAM2_ to _PARAM3_ at speed _PARAM4_

parameters.description: Speed in Seconds of the animation
parameters.name: AnimationSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: The current frame of the current animation.
eventsFunctions.name: CurrentFrame

eventsFunctions.description: Pause the animation of a sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: PauseAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: Resume a paused animation of a sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: ResumeAnimation

propertyDescriptors.label: Empty space between each sprite (in pixels)
propertyDescriptors.name: SpriteSpacing

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Animates a horizontal (left to right) sprite sheet.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: HorizontalSpriteSheetAnimator

eventsFunctions.description: Set the animation frame.
eventsFunctions.name: _SetFrame
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the current frame of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Play an animation from the sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: PlayAnimation
eventsFunctions.sentence: Play animation of _PARAM0_ on row _PARAM5_ from frames _PARAM2_ to _PARAM3_ at speed _PARAM4_

parameters.description: Speed in Seconds of the animation
parameters.name: AnimationSpeed

parameters.description: What row is the animation in
parameters.name: AnimationRow

eventsFunctions.description: The current frame of the current animation.
eventsFunctions.name: CurrentFrame

eventsFunctions.description: Pause the animation of a sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: PauseAnimation

eventsFunctions.description: Resume a paused animation of a sprite sheet.
eventsFunctions.name: ResumeAnimation

propertyDescriptors.label: Empty space between each sprite (in pixels)
propertyDescriptors.name: SpriteSpacing
